MS MCQs

    Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines - Design a database schema-change workflow in Azure Pipelines

    »

    1. True or false: The database connection string can be securely saved in the appsettings.json file of an ASP.NET Core web app in Azure?

      True

      False


    2. What does a SQL Server Data Tools project build produce?

      A SQL database

      A dacpac file that contains a SQL script of the database schema as it’s defined in the database project

      A SQLDelta.sql file that contains data to insert into the database for this project


    3. How is a build file for a SQL Server Data Tools database project useful in Azure Pipelines?

      The SqlAzureDacpacDeployment@1 task can create a database resource group based on that file.

      The SqlAzureDacpacDeployment@1 task can download the file from the pipeline artifacts. It can then automatically generate a SQL script that contains any database changes that need to be made.

      The SqlAzureDacpacDeployment@1 task can connect the web app to the database.
